channel.title: Could not find main class!
channel.description: hej, when people download my client, they get the error : could not find main.class! me and like 2 other players dont have that problem! its .jar file!

item.title: Could not find main class!
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

ok, ill just make a lil tut/snippet

download JarMaker.
Download Java JDK.
do this:

  1. Install java jdk
  2. Right click the run.bat , and edit.
  3. Find the main class (is in the run.bat), 317: client.class , 637: RunClient.class
  4. Open JarMaker.
  5. Follow this on how to jar and sign a client, change your main class to the main class that u just found!
  6. double click ur .jar to run it
    (7. when u want a webclient, upload it(dropbox is really easy))

---- How to make a webclient ----

  1. U need a webhost where you can add HTML codes to!
  2. For 317 upload this to your site: but first fill in the needed information!!

[code]

SERVER NAME HERE

 

[/code]
  1. For 637 add this to site: fill in the needed information

[code]

Server name here!!!

 

[/code]
  1. Save and ur done!!

Pleased to help ppl out ##first tut/snippet##

Don’t hate

##Btw its wrong section##

Read full topic
